title: Laibach - Laibachkunstderfuge [2008] +Bach's "original"
description:
Laibach's interpretation of Bach's Kunst der Fuge is not a usual Laibach concert but a 90 min performance-installation show - a concert for "Kreuzschach und vier Schachspieler", with surround sound and visuals.
